name: spoqify
title: Spoqify
description: Spoqify is an MIT-licensed dead-simple service that allows you to access Spotify playlists like an anonymous user
author: truex

commands.name: open-in-spotify
commands.title: Open in Spotify
commands.subtitle: Spoqify
commands.description: Open anonymized song radio in Spotify

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
